price: But if you must turn away from [those in need] while hoping to receive bounty from your Lord[26], then say to them words of comfort.
arabic: وَإِمَّا تُعۡرِضَنَّ عَنۡهُمُ ٱبۡتِغَآءَ رَحۡمَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّكَ تَرۡجُوهَا فَقُل لَّهُمۡ قَوۡلٗا مَّيۡسُورٗا
footnotes: [26] i.e., if you have nothing to give them now.
